item.title: Emacs
item.description: info system eg :What is the difference between setq and defvar in Emacs lisp? C-h i, m Elisp choose the Elisp manual i defvar search the index for “defvar” That’s all lexical binding(scope) elisp默认是dynamical scope, 若想使用statical binding
